website_summaries.verdict: Oval-shaped, 12-well, cast iron oyster grill pan with non-stick coating.
pros: Can grill up to 12 oysters on the half shell or shucked
Constructed of heavy duty cast iron for durability
Non-stick coating for easy removal and clean-up
Versatile pan can be used to make drop biscuits, cornbread, etc., or to serve chilled oysters on the half shell, deviled eggs, dipping sauces with crackers or veggies
cons: The pan is quite heavy, making it somewhat cumbersome to clean after use

customer_reviews.title: This works absolutely fine for my shucked oysters
customer_reviews.text: This works absolutely fine for my shucked oysters ...I brush melted garlic and butter in the bottom...then I put the seasonings on the oysters and bake in the oven instead of the grill...and we love them. served with sauteed` mushrooms and wild rice pilaf. I couldn't ask for a better way to do my oysters on the grill or in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: shedra

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about being too big and too heavy. It is not that large, it fits nicely on the BBQ. Cast iron is always heavy, what did you think? I seasoned it by their recommendations and it worked great. The oysters cooked great and came out of cast iron grill with ease. I will have to get another one for our travel trailer. It made great "Oysters Rockefeller". Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Heavy Duty Cast Iron
customer_reviews.text: This will last forever. It's heavy duty like you want your cast iron pans to be. I used it to smoke large sea scallops in garlic, butter, and other ingredients. The pan did its job perfectly. Before using it the first time, I seasoned it with lard per the included instructions. I wish I had used more lard or even vegetable oil for a more uniformed, less spotted seasoning, but it works just fine anyway. I'm ordering more scallops from Maine today, so I can use this pan again. Mmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Don L. Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for oyster lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for oyster lovers! Don’t put your oysters directly on your grill the salt ruin the grate instead use this cast iron pan. I also use for oysters Rockefeller in the oven. Great presentation!
customer_reviews.author: LALa

customer_reviews.title: Versatile - oysters and corn bread
customer_reviews.text: Boy is it heavy, but we will probably never have to buy another. Worked well with our local Chesapeake oysters. Can’t wait until next oyster season to enjoy more oysters. Until then my wife is using it to make corn bread.
customer_reviews.author: Neil, VA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill. I can't wait to do more oysters
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grill. I can't wait to do more oysters. The pan is excellent on my gas grill, and the recipe that comes with it is a winner. Outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for Chargrilled oysters
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. After a trip to New Orleans for chargrilled oysters we just had to find a way to make them at home. This pan was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cooking oysters on the BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I needed two because everyone loves the oysters prepared on the BBQ and this way I can fix 24 at once, sometimes I like to prepare them two different ways and this just makes it easier to tell one from the other.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: The answer to my oyster grilling
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item because it keeps the oysters warm longer, and each cavity can be seasoned differently so you can experiment between different recipes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mezger

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill pan! I also use it to make bacon wrapped jacked up shrimp - it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Press_On

customer_reviews.title: She is totally delighted! It was delivered as promised (even before P
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped to a friend for a special birthday present! She is totally delighted! It was delivered as promised (even before P.M. time) and I am very excited... enough to give it 5 stars/ Thank you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra seasoning really helps
customer_reviews.text: After more seasoning this pan is the bomb. I always season cast iron before I use it. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregry McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: love this for grilling oysters, cheaper than Sur Le Table's version. works the same
customer_reviews.author: B. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cast iron
customer_reviews.text: fabulous oysters cooked on Weber Q gas grill @ camp-a little spinach, garlic, wine and thin slice of cheddar !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've bought 5 of these!!
customer_reviews.text: I love mine so much. I've bought 4 more to give as gifts!! An awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Best oysters ever!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it worked on the grill. We put oysters that were pre-shucked with some cheese, sun-dried tomatoes and a tiny bit of bacon and grilled them until the oysters were cooked . Absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.author: S.Tatum Orr

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a husband who likes to cook
customer_reviews.text: High quality, grilled oysters to perfection! Great gift for a husband who likes to cook. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cast iron oyster dish is able to stabilize oysters so they don’t lose their “liquor”
customer_reviews.text: It’s a multipurpose, heavy duty cast iron pan. You can bake with it or serve raw oysters.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Parsnip

customer_reviews.title: heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for broiled oysters but need a strong arm to lift out of oven.
customer_reviews.author: perry

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THIS PAN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only within the last few years began to tolerate oysters. I prefer the brinier ones; I can stomach those much better than the others. This pan has changed the game for me. I can seriously hook up some oysters now! I think I will be ordering a second pan.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice cast iron pans
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little heavier than I wanted, but the pewter pans were 4X the cost.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Tailgating food hit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for tailgating and what a hit this made char boiled oyster and french bread so easy to do for a anytime treat.
customer_reviews.author: Kevdog I

customer_reviews.title: If you love oysters you need this.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with oysters. Tried muffins and just made a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of cast iron to add to your collection. Performance was as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Campsandalwood

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! I bring it with when we travel and have cooking facilities.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Everyone that makes oysters at home should ...
customer_reviews.text: GIFT OF THE YEAR! We love it. Everyone that makes oysters at home should own this.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok but the individual SS oyster shells are much easier to use for flaming oysters ACME style
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Holt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality product. By far, the best way to steam or charbroil fresh oysters without losing any of the tasty life-giving juices. Only better way to eat Alaskan oysters is raw on the half shell!
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Pan is sturdy, non stick and great to use on the grill. We ate oysters straight out of this pan. Everybody kept asking where we got it and couldn’t believe the price was so good.
customer_reviews.author: B. laurin

customer_reviews.title: Yo won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan for cooking oysters. No mess on the grill as we had previously when cooking oysters in their shell. We had to cook in the oven due to weather and the oysters were felt.
customer_reviews.author: TRP

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! You can grill on the pit outside or in your oven. In the shell or already shocked. I loved experimenting with different toppings for my oysters.
customer_reviews.author: cajunlady

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilled oysters
customer_reviews.text: Great for grilled oysters. Great for holding the oysters as you shuck them. Just a perfectly designed product if you like oysters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the shucker!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are wonderful for cooking oysters. Since they are cast iron, they need to be treated and cleaned according to instruction, to maintain their look and non-stick ability.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L Olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A gift for a family member! Can't wait to grill out!
customer_reviews.author: Bev Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pan is awesome we will use it every time we cook oysters
customer_reviews.author: Seafox

customer_reviews.title: very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Never opened the box, too heavy for me to deal with. Would return but too late
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great concept.
customer_reviews.text: We love to grill oysters and it can be a bit tricky. Looking forward to using this on the grill and in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Sock

customer_reviews.title: He was quite happy to get it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for an oyster-loving family friend, He was quite happy to get it, as he is quite the oyster lover.
customer_reviews.author: J Thom

customer_reviews.title: Love my product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. What I saw on the site is exactly what I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Deone J. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Quality product highly recommended! your oysters grilled in this will be awsome
customer_reviews.author: jim croak

customer_reviews.title: Oyster lovers new must have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and makes for easy prep. Even cooking. No sloppy mess on grill. Gift for husband and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Uses it all the time - easy to clean. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had a grill, I'd keep this for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A. Church

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love, baked oysters in it last night. Easy to clean. Need another one.
customer_reviews.author: starla barfield

customer_reviews.title: Love it eat 34 oysters this week
customer_reviews.text: Love it eat 34 oysters this week. Can't wait to oh to Hamma Hamma and get some of those.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great baking and serving pan, but it's heavier than I would have liked.

customer_reviews.title: Oyster Frill Pan
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time last night...very pleased. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: What a great item. Can use inside or on grill or ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great item . Can use inside or on grill or with fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: storekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for me to put on my BBQ GRILL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs one.
customer_reviews.text: OMGosh this pan is the best. Oysters are so much better and we also cooked shrimp. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pans worked perfectly, they are larger and heavier than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: Better than putting the shells directly on the grill. I wish the holes were a bit smaller so you could place oysters directly into the plate for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Miranda

customer_reviews.title: You want this!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad as a Christmas gift to use with his green egg and he was thrilled. My brother and uncle were so envious they went and bought their own! Good for shrimp too.
customer_reviews.author: holums

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift and the recipient seemed very pleased. Great for portion control as well when making ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and the recipient seemed very pleased. Great for portion control as well when making quick muffin meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i have used it 4-5 times already...one of my favorite cooking items of all time!
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Use it for mixing ingredients for my smoker. Works great and dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Hogdlr

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for my use at all!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care anything about it. I thought it was gonna be for shell less Oysters that I could cook without the shell. It's to heavy for me and just not worth the money or time for me. I can just use a muffin pain with aluminum foil to do what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Oysters
customer_reviews.text: I love making oysters Rockefeller but don't always have shells and rock salt. Now I don't have to. This pan is perfect. Makes great oysters. Love it'
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Wait! Check out stainless steel oyster shells, first.
customer_reviews.text: We love to grill fresh shucked oysters. When those are not available, we needed something to grill already shucked and in a container oysters. We ordered this and the SOS Stainless Steel Oyster Shells. We then made a dozen grilled Rockefeller in each pan/shell. We didn’t care for this one as much as the stainless steel oyster shells. I’m not sure we will ever use this pan, again. Check out the stainless steel oyster shells before you buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Natw16

customer_reviews.title: Outset 76225 Oyster Grill Pan
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, and retains heat very well. I seasoned it with bacon grease for 2 hours at 300 degrees on the grill. Tonight we baked oysters in this pan on the grill. Only took a few minutes we then used the pan as a serving tray. This kept the oysters,and cheese hot until all were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Granddad

customer_reviews.title: A good oyster baking dish
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice heavy cast iron pan and keeps the oysters hot. It is very large and makes cleanup a little cumbersome. I'm sure it will improve with time. It is really good for our baked oyster recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lee

customer_reviews.title: OysterMom approved
customer_reviews.text: I raise oysters in the Gulf of Mexico / Florida and have a continuous supply of terrific oysters. I love this for serving up oysters in any baked fashion. I sometimes shuck the oysters, put a few in each cup with the toppings and serve at cocktail parties or dinners with a serving spoon. Everyone can dip out their own onto their plates. A HUGE hit!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Keller

customer_reviews.title: Oyster Grilling at It's Finest
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome grilling dish to have for cooking on the grill and or in the oven. It makes grilling oysters so simple and they turn out absolutely delicious!! My husband loved the dish so much he even purchased another as a gift. Would highly recommend if you like grilled oysters! FYI- you can also cook scallops and shrimp in the dish and it comes out great also!
customer_reviews.author: Mya Bee

customer_reviews.title: Grill, oven and serve all in one. Nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pan. With oyster pans, you need to be able to use it on the grill, in the oven, and serve, and this does all of those things quite well, without buying a secondary pan or tray. Mine arrived with a small piece broken off the underside. I realize that shipping issues are to be reviewed separately, but think it's pertinent because I didn't think cast iron could have anything break off. That said, it's a lovely pan and I'm ordering the exact same one again as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Charbroiled Oysters @ home!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, heavyweight castiron pan. If cared for properly, it should last forever. I gave it to my husband as a gift & he loved it for broiled oysters & Oysters Rockefeller!!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica p.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pan for juicy grilled or baked oysters
customer_reviews.text: Just easily made fresh juicy baked oysters Rockefeller in this well designed pan! The design cradled the oyster perfectly keeping it from tipping and drying out. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Vance

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used it to make oysters out of shell, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, heavy pan. I use it to make Oysters Rockefeller on my gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this work for oysters on the grill it also cooks a perfect egg on the stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Mamasan

customer_reviews.title: Rockefeller is as good as it's name sake, gloriously rendered in this simple and delightful item.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a simple and straight forward cast iron pan for one purpose, and it works beautifully at that function.
customer_reviews.author: j briggs

customer_reviews.title: ... this to my son who raises oysters and he loved it, even just for serving the raw ones
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son who raises oysters and he loved it, even just for serving the raw ones!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerpolly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased...use for grilling oysters and also for baking stuffed mirlitons. Perfect for each!
customer_reviews.author: CA S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Pan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to bake oysters in the oven and this worked great. Use it several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Loved oysters before
customer_reviews.text: Loved oysters before, but now they just look so much more delicious on this pan. Encouraged us to try some new oyster recipes too. Used it on the stove and the grill. Cooks great and it gives a whole new flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Oyster Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Works great with either an oven or a grill. Retains heat and evenly cooks oysters. Only reason its not getting 5 stars is that it is very heavy for its size. I have a 18" cast iron pan that doesn't weigh as much as this pan. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HappyTraveler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GRILLING
customer_reviews.text: This Oyster Grill Pan is exceptional. I grilled a variety of oysters in this pan, using the Loftin Ceramic Oyster Shells. The pan and ceramic shells worked great and provided an appealing presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Z

product_meta.title: Outset 76225 Cast Iron Oyster Grill Pan, 12 Cavities, Black
product_meta.description: Style:12 Oyster Grill PanThe world is your oyster! OK, maybe not the whole world, but this pan is your oyster. Use this versatile 12-section pan to grill oysters on the half shell or shucked. Constructed of heavy duty cast iron, it features a seasoned, non-stick coating for easy release and cleaning. You can also use it to make single serving mac & cheese, drop biscuits, mini corn bread, and more. Fire up your creativity.
feature_bullets: Constructed of heavy duty cast iron
Features a seasoned, non-stick coating for easy release and cleaning
Grill up to 12 oysters on the half shell or shucked
Use pan to serve chilled oysters on the half shell, cook corn bread, drop biscuits, single serving mac 'n' cheese and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars307 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
